TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemBrushes extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 類別的每個屬性是 ，其為 Windows 顯示項目的色彩。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用鍵盤快速鍵設定<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>屬性。 它也會示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.FromSystemColor%2A>方法。 若要執行此範例中，將程式碼貼入表單中，處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件，並呼叫下列方法，傳遞`e`做為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ActiveBorder As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ActiveBorder { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為使用中視窗框線的色彩。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ActiveCaption As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ActiveCaption { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為使用中視窗標題列的背景色彩。
Docs.value: ，為使用中視窗標題列的背景色彩。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ActiveCaptionText As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ActiveCaptionText { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為使用中視窗標題列文字的色彩。
Docs.value: ，為使用中視窗標題列的背景色彩。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppWorkspace As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ AppWorkspace { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為應用程式工作區 (Workspace) 的色彩。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式工作區是多重文件檢視中沒有被文件佔領的區域。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ButtonFace As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ButtonFace { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為 3D 項目的表面色彩。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ButtonHighlight As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ButtonHighlight { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為 3D 項目的醒目提示色彩。
Docs.value: ，為 3D 項目的反白顯示色彩。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個色彩會套用至面對光源的 3D 項目部分。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ButtonShadow As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ButtonShadow { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為 3D 項目的陰影色彩。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個色彩會套用至背對光源的 3D 項目部分。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Control As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ Control { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為 3D 項目的表面色彩。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlDark As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ControlDark { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為 3D 項目的陰影色彩。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陰影色彩會套用至背對光源的 3D 項目部分。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlDarkDark As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ControlDarkDark { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為 3D 項目的深色陰影色彩。
Docs.value: ，為 3D 項目的深色陰影色彩。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 深色陰影色彩會套用至色彩最深的 3D 項目部分。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlLight As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ControlLight { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為 3D 項目的淺色色彩。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 淺色色彩會套用至面對光源的 3D 項目部分。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlLightLight As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ControlLightLight { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為 3D 項目的醒目提示色彩。
Docs.value: ，為 3D 項目的反白顯示色彩。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 反白色彩會套用至色彩最亮的 3D 項目部分。

public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ControlText { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property GradientActiveCaption As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ GradientActiveCaption { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為使用中視窗標題列之色彩漸層中最亮的色彩。
Docs.value: ，為現用視窗標題列的色彩漸層中最亮的色彩。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property GradientInactiveCaption As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ GradientInactiveCaption { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property GrayText As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ GrayText { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為暗灰色文字的色彩。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已停用的項目在清單中會顯示在呈現暗灰色文字。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Highlight As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ Highlight { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為選取之項目的背景色彩。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取的項目可能包含功能表項目，以及選取的文字。 例如，筆刷可能用於清單方塊中選取的項目背景的色彩。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property HighlightText As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ HighlightText { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為選取之項目的文字色彩。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取的項目可能包含功能表項目，以及選取的文字。 例如，筆刷可能用於清單方塊中選取的項目文字的色彩。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property HotTrack As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ HotTrack { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得 ，其為用來指定熱點追蹤項目的色彩。
Docs.value: ，為用來指定熱點追蹤項目的色彩。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下熱點追蹤的項目會執行該項目。
